item.title: Copilot and copyright
item.description: Copilot is a code autocomplete tool created using artificial intelligence. Autocomplete tools that use artificial intelligence are not new. However, the copilot is different. Copilot uses state of the art in artificial intelligence to create code, training with millions of open-source projects. This is a great tool for developers, but it also raises some questions about the future of open-source projects. Intellectual property First, let’s talk about intellectual property. Intellectual property is a legal right that gives the author of a work the exclusive right to reproduce, distribute, perform, and display the work publicly.
